abstract: Taylor Swift and other female musicians rally for pop singer Kesha after State Supreme Court in Manhattan rules against singer’s request for release from her Sony recording contract while her case against music producer Dr Luke plays out; Kesha had sued Dr Luke in 2014, claiming he had been sexually and emotionally abusing her.

headline.print_headline: Allies Line Up to Support Kesha in Legal Battle
headline.main: Big Names Use Social Media to Support Kesha in Legal Battle

snippet: Singers like Lady Gaga, Miley Cyrus and Taylor Swift are backing Kesha’s battle against her former mentor, Dr. Luke, after a court ruling in New York.
lead_paragraph: Singers like Lady Gaga, Miley Cyrus and Taylor Swift are backing Kesha’s battle against her former mentor, Dr. Luke, after a court ruling in New York.
